segments.text: Susan ? We ’ re having a farewell party for John Anderson today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What time ? I ’ d like to go , but my calendar is really full today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We ’ re starting at 12:00 and it ’ ll go on for the rest of the afternoon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ ll try to make it . I should be able to fit some time in around 3 o ’ clock .
segments.speaker: S2
